Description.Details: The Micro Pulse Laser is a very compact version of conventional Pulse laser weaponry. An improvement upon standard Small Lasers, Micro Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy at the same range and damage. Like all Pulse Lasers, Micro Pulse Lasers are extremely accurate.

Modes.Name: Low Power Mode
Modes.Description: Using less Energy to create the Laser reduces heat generation at the cost of Damage.
